1.name: Cut Throat
1.details: Every few seconds, Forsaken's basic attack reaps the enemy, causing them to bleed, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) over a duration.

2.name: Death Hook
2.details:
Forsaken swings up his chain then throws the hook part at a target direction, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to the first enemy hit.

Death Hook also briefly slows the target and slightly pulls the target toward him. If the target is an enemy Hero, Forsaken will also dash toward the target.

3.name: Slaughter Zone
3.details: Forsaken selects a target area and while he's inside, his basic attack has increased range and deal additional physical damage (scaling with physical power).

4.name: The Hunt
4.details:
Forsaken gains increased movement speed and becomes camouflaged for a duration. He will gain increased attack speed when exiting camouflage.

Takedown on enemy Hero that Forsaken recently damaged will reset The Hunt's cooldowns.

Forsaken can cast Slaughter Zone without revealing himself.

5.name: Multilate
5.details:
Forsaken slashes the chain in a large radius, hitting all nearby enemies in the outer range and dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) plus their missing health.

Enemies hit will be affected with Cut Throat and those who are already affected will have the duration reset.
